recommendedCharacters.name: Neuvillette
recommendedCharacters.reason: Special guest with bonus stats. Exceptional hydro damage and self-sustain make him ideal for Theater challenges.

recommendedCharacters.name: Arlecchino
recommendedCharacters.reason: Special guest with bonus stats. Top-tier pyro DPS with self-sustain perfect for Theater's endurance format.

recommendedCharacters.name: Furina
recommendedCharacters.reason: Best-in-slot support for most Theater teams. Massive damage boost and works with all DPS options.

recommendedCharacters.name: Kazuha
recommendedCharacters.reason: Universal anemo support with crowd control. Essential for multiple team compositions in Theater.

recommendedCharacters.name: Xingqiu
recommendedCharacters.reason: Consistent hydro application and damage reduction. Core enabler for vape and freeze teams.

recommendedCharacters.name: Yelan
recommendedCharacters.reason: Alternative to Xingqiu with higher personal damage. Excellent for Theater's multi-team format.

recommendedCharacters.name: Bennett
recommendedCharacters.reason: Universal ATK buffer and healer. Essential for pyro teams and provides sustain.

recommendedCharacters.name: Mona
recommendedCharacters.reason: Omen buff for burst windows. Good hydro application and works well in freeze comps.

recommendedCharacters.name: Ayaka
recommendedCharacters.reason: Strong cryo DPS for freeze teams. High burst damage for Theater challenges.

recommendedCharacters.name: Ganyu
recommendedCharacters.reason: Versatile cryo DPS. Can work as main DPS or sub DPS in freeze teams.

recommendedCharacters.name: Xiangling
recommendedCharacters.reason: Strong off-field pyro damage. Core for vaporize teams.

recommendedCharacters.name: Sucrose
recommendedCharacters.reason: Budget alternative to Kazuha. Good EM sharing for reaction teams.

recommendedCharacters.name: Diona
recommendedCharacters.reason: Cryo battery with shielding and healing. Good for freeze teams.

recommendedCharacters.name: Rosaria
recommendedCharacters.reason: Cryo support with crit rate sharing. Flexible for freeze and melt teams.

recommendedCharacters.name: Chongyun
recommendedCharacters.reason: Cryo infusion support. Niche use in specific freeze setups.

difficultyNotes.visionary: Bring 3-4 well-built teams. Focus on special guests for maximum bonus.
difficultyNotes.hard: 2-3 teams needed. Special guests provide significant advantage.
difficultyNotes.normal: 1-2 teams sufficient. Good for testing team compositions.
